INDICATOR_NAME: Employees, industry, male (% of male employment)
SOURCE_NOTE: Employees are people who work for a public or private employer and receive remuneration in wages, salary, commission, tips, piece rates, or pay in kind. Industry corresponds to divisions 2-5 (ISIC revision 2) or tabulation categories C-F (ISIC revision 3) and includes mining and quarrying (including oil production), manufacturing, construction, and public utilities (electricity, gas, and water).
SOURCE_ORGANIZATION: International Labour Organization, Key Indicators of the Labour Market database.
